GapFillInput.Title: Present simple: positive and negative forms
GapFillInput.Instruction: Put the verb in brackets into the correct form. Type the answer into each gap. Use short forms.

Content.Question:
1. Her sister goes (go) to the park at lot.
2. My friend really likes (like) rock music.
3. His brother doesn't watch (not / watch) a lot of television.
4. Sally uses (use) the computer at home.
5. Sean doesn't have (not / have) a dog.
6. She teaches (teach) French at the university.
7. He doesn't like (not / like) cartoons.
8. Tessa studies (study) at home a lot.
9. Mike doesn't work (not / work) in the centre of the city.
10. My brother doesn't play (not / play) football at school.
